001package pkg_class;
002import pkg_class.pkg_item.ItemList;
003import pkg_class.pkg_room.Door;
004import pkg_class.pkg_pnj.GuidePnj;
005
006import java.util.Stack;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.ArrayList;
009/**
010 * This class is part of the RPandaScape application. 
011 * RPandaScape is a very simple, text based adventure game.
012 * 
013 * The player is defined by his name. 
014 * He can carry items (up to a certain weight) and can have money.
015 * 
016 * The Player class also contains the rooms where he has passed by.
017 * 
018 * A player also need a certain amont of energy to survie,
019 * this ernergie can be replenish with food (edible items).
020 *
021 * @author Elie DUBOUX
022 * @version 2021.12.12
023 * @see ItemList
024 * @see Room
025 */
026public class Player
027{
028    /**
029     * The name of the player.
030     */
031    private String aName;
032    /**
033     * The maximum weight a player can carry.
034     */
035    private int aMaxWeight;
036    /**
037     * The money the player currently have.
038     */
039    private int aMoney;
040    /**
041     * The room where the player currently is.
042     */
043    private Room aCurrentRoom;
044    /**
045     * The rooms where the player passed by during the game.
046     */
047    private Stack<Room> aPreviousRooms;
048    /**
049     * The items that the player carry.
050     */
051    private ItemList aItems;
052    /**
053     * The current level of energy.
054     */
055    private int aCurrentEnergy;
056    /**
057     * The skills a player has.
058     */
059    private List<String> aSkills;
060    /**
061     * Check if the player has already received the feather.
062     */
063    private boolean aHasFeather;
064    /**
065     * Check if the player can access to the final dialog.
066     */
067    private boolean aCanHaveFinalSpeech;
068    /**
069     * Check if the player has the final dialog.
070     */
071    private boolean aHadFinalSpeech;
072    /**
073     * The Guide.
074     */
075    private GuidePnj aGuide;
076    /**
077     * Constructor.
078     * @param pName The name of the player.
079     * @param pWeightMax The maximum weight he can carry.
080     * @param pStartingEnergy The energy at the begining.
081     */
082    public Player(final String pName, final int pWeightMax, final int pStartingEnergy)
083    {
084        this.aName = pName;
085        this.aMaxWeight = pWeightMax;
086        this.aMoney = 0;
087        this.aPreviousRooms = new Stack<Room>();
088        this.aItems = new ItemList();
089        this.aCurrentEnergy = pStartingEnergy;
090        this.aSkills = new ArrayList<String>();
091        this.aHasFeather = false;
092        this.aCanHaveFinalSpeech = false;
093        this.aHadFinalSpeech = false;
094    }//Player()
095    
096    /**
097     * Try to walk in a given direction. If there is a door
098     * this will change the player's location.
099     * @param pDirection The direction.
100     * @return The message that will be printed by the gui.
101     */
102    public String walk(String pDirection)
103    {
104        // Try to leave current room.
105        Room vNextRoom = this.aCurrentRoom.getExit(pDirection);
106        
107        if (vNextRoom == null)
108            return "It is impossible to go there.";
109        if (vNextRoom == Room.UNKNOWN_DIRECTION)
110            return "Unknown direction !";
111        
112        StringBuilder vMessage = new StringBuilder();
113        
114        //Check if there is a door
115        Door vDoor = this.aCurrentRoom.getDoor(pDirection);
116        if (vDoor != null)
117        {
118            if (!this.hasSkill(vDoor.getSkill()))
119                return "A skill is needed to pass through here.";
120            vMessage.append("You use the skill '" + vDoor.getSkill() + "' to go there.\n");
121        }
122        
123        this.loseEnergy(1);
124        if (!vNextRoom.isBackPossible(this.aCurrentRoom))
125        {
126            vMessage.append("You can't go back from this exit.\n");
127            this.clearPreviousRooms();
128        }
129        else
130        {
131            vMessage.append("You are going towards "+ pDirection);
132            this.pushPreviousRoom(this.aCurrentRoom);
133        }
134        
135        this.setCurrentRoom(vNextRoom);
136        
137        return vMessage.toString();
138    }//walk()
139    
140    /**
141     * The player learn a new skill.
142     * @param pSkill The name of the skill.
143     */
144    public void addSkill(final String pSkill)
145    {
146        this.aSkills.add(pSkill);
147    }//addSkill()
148    
149    /**
150     * Check if the player has learned the skill given in parameter.
151     * @param pSkill The skill.
152     * @return True if the player has this skill,
153     * false if not.
154     */
155    public boolean hasSkill(final String pSkill)
156    {
157        return this.aSkills.contains(pSkill);
158    }//hasSkill()
159    
160    /**
161     *  Reduce the current level of energy.
162     *  @param pEnergyLost The amont of energy lost.
163     */
164    public void loseEnergy(final int pEnergyLost)
165    {
166        this.aCurrentEnergy -= pEnergyLost;
167    }//loseEnergy()
168    
169    /**
170     *  Replenish some energy.
171     *  @param pEnergyGain The amont of energy gained.
172     */
173    public void gainEnergy(final int pEnergyGain)
174    {
175        this.aCurrentEnergy += pEnergyGain;
176    }//loseEnergy()
177    
178    /**
179     * Check if the current energy of the player is equal to 0.
180     * return True if the the energy equals 0,
181     * false if not.
182     * @return True if the player has no energy left,
183     * false otherwise.
184     */
185    public boolean isEnergyEmpty()
186    {
187        return this.aCurrentEnergy == 0;
188    }//isEnergyEmpty()
189    
190    /**
191     * Add a room in the previousRooms list.
192     * @param pPreviousRoom The rooms the player was previously.
193     */
194    public void pushPreviousRoom(final Room pPreviousRoom)
195    {
196        this.aPreviousRooms.push(pPreviousRoom);
197    }//pushPreviousRoom()
198    
199    /**
200     * Remove the last a room in the previousRooms list.
201     * @return The last room the player was previously.
202     */
203    public Room popPreviousRoom()
204    {
205        return this.aPreviousRooms.pop();
206    }//popPreviousRoom()
207    
208    /**
209     * Check if there is previous rooms.
210     * @return True if the previousRooms is empty,
211     * false if not.
212     */
213    public boolean isPreviousRoomsEmpty()
214    {
215        return this.aPreviousRooms.empty();
216    }//isPreviousRoomsEmpty()
217    
218    /**
219     * Remove all the previous room the player went before.
220     */
221    public void clearPreviousRooms()
222    {
223        this.aPreviousRooms.clear();
224    }//clearPreviousRooms()
225    
226    /**
227     * Check if it's possible to remove the item X time(s).
228     * @param pItem The Item.
229     * @param pItemNb The number of time.
230     * @return True if the items can be removed,
231     * false if not.
232     */
233    public boolean isRemovePossible(final Item pItem, final int pItemNb)
234    {
235        return this.aItems.hasEnough(pItem, pItemNb);
236    }//isRemovePossible()
237    
238    /**
239     * Check if it's possible to add the item X time(s).
240     * @param pItem The Item.
241     * @param pItemNb The number of time.
242     * @return True if the items can be added,
243     * false if not.
244     */
245    public boolean isAddPossible(final Item pItem, final int pItemNb)
246    {
247        return (this.aItems.getWeightTotal()+ pItem.getWeight()*pItemNb) <= this.aMaxWeight;
248    }//isAddPossible()
249    
250    /**
251     * Add one item X time(s) in the player inventory.
252     * @param pItem The item.
253     * @param pItemNb The number of time.
254     */
255    public void addItems(final Item pItem, final int pItemNb)
256    {
257        this.aItems.addItems(pItem, pItemNb);
258    }//addItems()
259    
260    /**
261     * Remove one item X time(s) in the player inventory.
262     * @param pItem The item.
263     * @param pItemNb The number of time.
264     */
265    public void removeItems(final Item pItem, final int pItemNb)
266    {
267        this.aItems.removeItems(pItem, pItemNb);
268    }//removeItems()
269    
270    /**
271     * Change the name of the player.
272     * @param pName The new player's name.
273     */
274    public void setName(final String pName)
275    {
276        this.aName = pName;
277    }//setName()
278    
279    /**
280     * Allow the player to have acces to the guide.
281     * Used when it needs to change it's final speech.
282     * @param pGuidePnj The guide.
283     */
284    public void setGuide(final GuidePnj pGuidePnj)
285    {
286        this.aGuide = pGuidePnj;
287    }
288    
289    /**
290     * Change the maximum weight the player can carry.
291     * @param pMaxWeight The new maximum weight.
292     */
293    public void setMaxWeight(final int pMaxWeight)
294    {
295        this.aMaxWeight = pMaxWeight;
296    }//setMaxWeight()
297    
298    /**
299     * Change the room where the player is currently in.
300     * @param pCurrentRoom The new room.
301     */
302    public void setCurrentRoom(final Room pCurrentRoom)
303    {
304        this.aCurrentRoom = pCurrentRoom;
305    }//setCurrentRoom()
306    
307    /**
308     * When the traveller give the feather to the player.
309     */
310    public void setHasFeather()
311    {
312        this.aHasFeather = true;
313    }//giveFeather
314    
315    /**
316     * The player can now have access to the final speech.
317     * It also set the final speech for the guide.
318     */
319    public void setCanHaveFinalSpeech()
320    {
321        this.aCanHaveFinalSpeech = true;
322        this.aGuide.changeSpeechFinal();
323    }
324    
325    /**
326     * Method called when the played has ended the final speech,
327     * he can now finish the game.
328     */
329    public void setHadFinalSpeech()
330    {
331        this.aHadFinalSpeech = true;
332    }
333
334    /**
335     * Return the name of the player.
336     * @return The player's name.
337     */
338    public String getName()
339    {
340        return this.aName;
341    }//gteName()
342    
343    /**
344     * Return the room where the player currently is.
345     * @return The player's name.
346     */
347    public Room getCurrentRoom()
348    {
349        return this.aCurrentRoom;
350    }//getCurrentRoom()
351    
352    /**
353     * Return the player's max weight.
354     * @return The player's max weight.
355     */
356    public int getMaxWeight()
357    {
358        return this.aMaxWeight;
359    }//getMaxWeight()
360    
361    /**
362     * Return the item with the name given in parameter.
363     * @param pItemName The name of the item.
364     * @return The item.
365     */
366    public Item getItem(final String pItemName)
367    {
368        return this.aItems.getItem(pItemName);
369    }//getItem()
370    
371    /**
372     *  Return the current level of energy.
373     *  @return The current energy.
374     */
375    public int getCurrentEnergy()
376    {
377        return this.aCurrentEnergy;
378    }//getEnergyMax()
379    
380    /**
381     *  Check if the traveller has given the feather to the player.
382     *  @return True if the player has already recieved the feather,
383     *  false otherwise.
384     */
385    public boolean hasFeather()
386    {
387        return this.aHasFeather;
388    }//hasFeather()
389    
390    /**
391     * Check if the player can have access to the final speech.
392     * @return True if The player can have the final speech,
393     * false otherwise.
394     */
395    public boolean canHaveFinalSpeech()
396    {
397        return this.aCanHaveFinalSpeech;
398    }
399    
400    /**
401     * Check if the player has already had the final speech.
402     * @return True if the player had already done it,
403     * false otherwise.
404     */
405    public boolean hadFinalSpeech()
406    {
407        return this.aHadFinalSpeech;
408    }
409       
410    /**
411     * Return the inventory of the player as a String.
412     * @return The items with their number.
413     */
414    public String getItemsString()
415    {
416        return "The items you carry :\n" + this.aItems.toString() +
417               "The weight you carry / The max you can have: " + this.aItems.getWeightTotal() +" / " + this.aMaxWeight + "\n" + 
418               "The money you have : "+ this.aMoney + "\n";
419    }//getItemsString()
420}//Player
